issue.title: [C++][Doc] Undocumented compute functions (string_isalpha, etc.)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9444](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9444). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7656#issuecomment-657721811

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9444?focusedCommentId=17157235) by Maarten Breddels (maartenbreddels):*
Feel free to assign to me, I didn't know there was a place for documenting this. It will however take ~3 weeks before I commit significant time into Arrow again. I hope that's not an issue with 1.0 coming soon.
